data.title: Volunteer to mentor students in the Cleveland Metropolitan School District

data.text:
True2U is always looking for dedicated and caring adults who are passionate about positively impacting the community by connecting with Cleveland’s future.

True2U is a hands-on volunteer mentoring program that combines an engaging, structured curriculum with activities and discussions. This program provides our volunteer mentors the unique opportunity to share their career experiences and insights with a class of 8th graders in the Cleveland Metropolitan School District (CMSD). Through True2U, students discover their strengths, explore their interests, and learn about various career opportunities. Additionally, they explore the high schools available to them within the 30+ options in the CMSD portfolio.

Join us in making a difference and creating a meaningful experience for our CMSD 8th-grade students. Visit our website to learn more about becoming a True2U mentor www.true2umentor.org.
